welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Methuen Town, a charming city known for its rich history and vibrant culture. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our wonderful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Boire Field Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Boire Field Airport is for exclusive use by private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hanscom Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Hanscom Field Airport is dedicated to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights and houses several airlines including JetBlue and Delta.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights and is the largest terminal at Logan International Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves primarily international flights and is home to several major airlines such as American Airlines and United Airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.
